title: Train fault reported at Toa Payoh station

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service from MarinaSouthPier to ToaPayoh has resumed. Trains may be traveling at a slower speed due to earlier fault.
[NSL]DELAY: Due to a train fault @ Toa Payoh, please expect additional traveling time of 25 mins from Marina South Pier to Toa Payoh.
[NSL]:Our engineers are working on it. We will update again on the delay.
[NSL]:A train fault has been reported at Toa Payoh station, Trains are moving slower towards Jurong East.
